msg.msgText: Unknown connection handshake on connection: From={0}:{1} Server={2}:{3}.

msgExplanation.p: A connection was attempted in a wire format that is not known by the Message Gateway server. This error indicates that a client other than a Message Gateway client is configured to connect to a Message Gateway server. If this error occurs at high volumes, the cause might be a denial of service attack.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the client attempting to connect to the Message Gateway server is correctly configured.
